title: Grane
medium: Woodcut with paint and collage additions
dimensions: composition and sheet (irreg.): 9' 1 1/16" x 8' 2 1/2" (277.1 x 250.3 cm)
credits: Purchased with funds given in honor of Riva Castleman by The Committee on Painting and Sculpture, The Associates Fund, Molly and Walter Bareiss, Nelson Blitz, Jr. with Catherine Woodard and Perri and Allison Blitz, Agnes Gund, The Philip and Lynn Straus Foundation, Howard B.
